title: The Hayseed
description:
It's Harvest Time!

Th [b]Hayseed[/b] adds a new character to Slay the Spire with a bounty of farming-themed mechanics and flavor.

This mod introduces 75+ new cards and 13 custom relics, plus unique potions, curses and events.

[h1]Mechanics[/h1]
* Plant [b]Crops[/b] and grow them to maturity—then harvest for a variety of effects. Shuffle your draw pile to grow your crops organically, or play cards designed to accelerate their growth.

* [b]Seasons[/b] bring a randomized mix of crops to each run for loads of replayability. Seasonal events and curses offer additional variety and flavor.

Many strategies are supported—diversify your crop selection, load eneemies up with debuffs, harvest early and often for a different set of payoffs, or focus on synergies between a few key crops.
